title: Singer Duffy unveils music comeback 'to lift spirits in troubling times'
description: The star says she hopes her first original song since 2010 lifts spirits in "these troubling times".

title: Coronavirus: When elderly parents want to carry on socialising
description: What if older relatives or friends prefer to ignore the risks and don't want to stay in?

title: Q&A: What next for English football after suspension extended to 30 April?
description: BBC Sport's Simon Stone answers some of the questions posed after Thursday's update from football bosses.

title: Coronavirus: Nurse's despair as panic-buyers clear shelves
description: The exhausted critical care nurse says that people need to make sure everyone can get healthy food.

title: Coronavirus: How bad information goes viral
description: Bad information about the pandemic is everywhere. This is how one dodgy post spread.

title: 'A magical left foot and a gentle soul': Whittingham dies aged 35
description: Former Cardiff City midfielder Peter Whittingham, one of the Bluebirds' all-time greats, has died at the age of 35.

title: Coronavirus: Premier League players join charity FIFA 20 tournament
description: It's been organised by League Two club Leyton Orient to keep fans entertained while games are postponed.

title: Coronavirus: Asian nations face second wave of imported cases
description: There is growing concern that people returning home as borders close could bring the virus with them.

title: Coronavirus: Answers promised after school shutdown confusion
description: The government will provide more details on how people will be affected by the school closures.

title: Windrush scandal: Home Office showed 'ignorance’ of race
description: The Windrush scandal review adds there was a "profound institutional failure" affecting thousands of people.

title: Coronavirus: First death confirmed in NI
description: The patient was elderly, had an underlying medical condition and was being treated in hospital.

title: Coronavirus: 40 London Underground stations to be closed
description: The night Tube will be stopped from this weekend as part of new contingency plans across London.

title: Coronavirus: Europe looking to extend virus lockdowns
description: Stringent measures could be long-lasting, with France and Italy talking tough on transgressors.

title: Next boss: 'People do not buy a new outfit to stay at home'
description: Next says both online and store sales will suffer "significant losses" as a result of coronavirus.

title: Ferrari ready to support delay to major F1 rules changes
description: Ferrari say they will support a plan to delay the introduction of major new rules aimed at improving the racing in the wake of the coronavirus crisis.

title: 'Anything is possible but too early to decide' - Coe on calls to cancel Olympics
description: It is too early to decide whether to cancel the Tokyo 2020 Olympics, says World Athletics chief Lord Coe.

title: Gal Gadot, Natalie Portman and Amy Adams in star-studded Imagine cover
description: The self-isolating Wonder Woman actress enlists Natalie Portman and Amy Adams for a cover of Imagine.

title: On this day in 2007: Shevchenko and Wright-Phillips send Chelsea through to FA Cup semis
description: Watch as Andriy Shevchenko and Sean Wright-Phillips score two stunning goals against Spurs to send Chelsea through to the 2007 FA Cup semi-finals.

title: Coronavirus: Energy bill help for vulnerable amid outbreak
description: Prepayment meter customers may get credit through the post or funds automatically added to their meter.

title: Coronavirus: Singing to raise spirits during isolation
description: Cor-ona is a social media group where people can post videos of themselves singing while isolated.

title: Coronavirus: 'There isn't time. Firms are closing now'
description: Firms are confused about how to access the government support promised to combat the impact of coronavirus.

title: 'Farmer's claims won't affect Fury's career' - Costello & Bunce
description: Mike Costello and Steve Bunce say that new allegations about Tyson Fury's defence against past doping allegations will not affect the fighter's career.

title: Airlines warn they may not survive without bailout
description: Major European airlines have warned that they face collapse unless governments come to their rescue.

title: Coronavirus: Facebook group helps parents and kids during isolation
description: As families self-isolate, one mum created a group to share fun tips and ideas for engaging children.

title: Newspaper headlines: UK schools close as London 'prepares for shutdown'
description: The closure of UK schools and reports of plans to lock down the capital feature on the front pages.

title: Coronavirus: South Africa braces for the worst
description: Andrew Harding visits a poor South African neighbourhood to see how it will cope with an outbreak.

title: Coronavirus: Air pollution and CO2 fall rapidly as virus spreads
description: Some regions show significant drops in air pollutants as the coronavirus hits work and travel.

title: Does pandemic offer US and Iran chance for partial reset?
description: Jonathan Marcus looks at whether the crisis might lead to some rapprochement between the arch-foes.

title: Coronavirus: How to exercise while staying at home
description: How do we keep fit while heeding the government's new advice on avoiding unnecessary social contact?

title: Why Anneka Rice got the urge to find her waxwork head
description: The BBC presenter reveals why she challenged herself to go on her own personal treasure hunt.

title: Hiking and beach cleaning - in heels and drag
description: Pattie Gonia is on a mission to get everyone, especially LGBTQ people, outside and caring for Mother Nature.

title: Coronavirus: The detectives racing to contain the virus in Singapore
description: The country moved fast to identify every single contact of every infected person - and it worked.

title: Coronavirus: The med students who want to help
description: Final year medical students in Liverpool are signing up to volunteer in hospitals.

title: Coronavirus: Three grandmothers self-isolating together
description: Doreen, Carol and Dotty have come up with a plan to live together if further restrictions are brought in.

title: The steampunk model railway enthusiast having designs used by Hornby
description: A model enthusiast has had his own steampunk designs patented by the British railway brand Hornby.

title: Coronavirus: What are independent supermarkets doing to help?
description: As shoppers stockpile in response to coronavirus, how are independent shops coping?

title: Singapore has moved all its hawkers indoors, and other big Asian cities are following suit
description: Singapore has moved all its street food vendors indoors. Could that be a model for other cities?
